meta_title: Why BOMs Are the Foundation of 2026 Maintenance Strategy
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces back to inaccurate BOMs. Hereâ€™s how to build a dynamic Bill of Materials that fuels AI-driven maintenance and MRO efficiency.
title: Why Your BOMs Are the Foundation of Maintenance Success in 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Why Your BOMs Are the Foundation of Maintenance Success in 2026

image_prompt: A professional maintenance manager and a senior technician standing in a modern, brightly lit 2026 manufacturing facility. They are conducting an audit of a complex industrial pump system. The manager, a woman in her 40s, is wearing a white hard hat, safety glasses, and a high-visibility vest over a professional work shirt. She is holding a ruggedized industrial tablet, but we only see the back of the device. The technician, a man in his 50s, is wearing a blue hard hat and similar safety gear, pointing toward a specific component on the pump. The environment is clean, with clear safety markings on the floor and other high-tech machinery in the blurred background. The lighting is natural and crisp, emphasizing a high-tech, professional atmosphere. Full-body shot showing their stance and the scale of the equipment. No text or digital displays are visible.
